string.text:
An implement used for a millennia to shape, split and cut wood, to harvest timber, as a weapon and as a ceremonial or heraldic symbol. The axe has many forms, is versatile and dangerous when used offensively.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Melee Weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Light Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]120
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Heavy Attack Power: %c[ui_gray_2]170
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Armor Penetration: %c[ui_gray_2]24
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Increased Range
